introduction.text: What would you like us to help you with?

1.question: What product(s)/service(s) does/do your company offer?
choices: Fast-selling consumer goods (e.g. food, drink, confectionery products)
Industrial consumables or durables (e.g. raw materials, components, machinery, etc.)

2.question: How long are you in the business?

3.question: Is the trend of sales an inquiries up or down

4.question: How many sales offices, sales locations, or distribution points does your company have?
choices: One or more domestic offices and at least one foreign office

5.question: For what timeframe is your company’s business plan

7.question: How much time is your company going to dedicate to export planning
choices: Considerable planning efforts (three to six months)

8.question: How quickly does management expect export operations to become self-sustaining?

9.question: Has your company's management allocated (or re-allocated) resources for the export effort?
choices: Allocated both personnel and financial resources
No extra resources will be allocated

10.question: Which of the following U.S. market entry barriers have you researched?

11.question: When you were setting the US price for your product/service, what did you take into account?

12.question: Have you decided on your preferred methods of payment for your export quotations?

13.question: What does your U. S. market analyses include of the following?

14.question: Have you decided on what distribution channels will you use in the US?

15.question: Do you have a clear idea of the mix of promotional methods that will be used in the US

16.question: Do you have promotional materials in English language?

17.question: Do you have a website in English language?

18.question: With how many countries has business been conducted?

19.question: Have you already discussed exporting to the U.S. with other companies that are already experienced on the U.S. market?

20.question: Have you participated in international trade shows in the U.S.?
choices: Two and more as an attendee
More then once as an attendee & at least once as an exhibitor

21.question: How much international business experience does your staff have, either/both in theory and/or practice?

22.question: Which of your company’s employees speak English?
choices: Administrative staff and A and B

23.question: Did your company succeeded in obtaining a bank loan in the last 10 years?

24.question: What method of payment do you consider the least secure?

25.question: How is your company using e-mail communication method?
choices: Both as internal & external communication method
